section.simpara: Transmits the provided string as Morse code.
Plays back the provided string in Morse code.
section.programlisting: exten => 123,1,Answer() exten => 123,n,Morsecode("The dog barks at midnight.") exten => 123,n,Hangup()

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Morsecode' =-
[Synopsis] Plays morse code
[Description] Usage: Morsecode(<string>) Plays the Morse code equivalent of the passed string. If the variable MORSEDITLEN is set, it will use that value for the length (in ms) of the dit (defaults to 80). Additionally, if MORSETONE is set, it will use that tone (in Hz). The tone default is 800.
